message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $180?
I appreciate your offer, but $180 is a bit higher than my budget. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still think the product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $160.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $130. If you're not willing to accept that, I'm happy to buy from John.
